original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>首次 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1276)@</color> 秒，每用一次遞增 <color=#ccffcc>10</color> 秒 以 <color=#ccffcc>4</color> 秒為間隔對敵方武將發出 <color=#ccffcc>4</color> 次降低士氣和 <color=#ccffcc>15%</color> 所有抗性的<color=#4cc769>生擒光環</color>，當敵方武將身上累積滿 <color=#ccffcc>4</color> 次光環狀態則生擒成功，被生擒成功的敵方武將會在戰場上直接撤退，且每次使用最多只能生擒 <color=#ccffcc>1</color> 名武將。<color=#FFE787>基礎生擒率</color>： <color=#ccffcc>+5%</color> <color=#FFE787>特殊生擒率</color>： 武力智力低於劉備時 <color=#ccffcc>+30%</color><color=#FFE787>額外生擒率</color>： 目標體力每少 <color=#ccffcc>1%</color> 則機率 <color=#ccffcc>+1%</color>
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color> First time <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1276)@</color> seconds, each time it is used, it will increase <color=#ccffcc>10</color> seconds At <color=#ccffcc>4</color> seconds as an interval, issue <color=#ccffcc>4</color> times to reduce morale and <color=#ccffcc>15%</color> all resistances <color=#4cc769>Capture Halo</color>, when the enemy generals have accumulated <color=#ccffcc>4</color> times, the aura status will be captured successfully, and the captured enemy generals will be on the battlefield. Retreat directly, and each use can only capture <color=#ccffcc>1</color> famous generals. <color=#FFE787>Basic capture rate</color>:  <color=#ccffcc>+5%</color> <color=#FFE787>Special capture rate</color>:  Military intelligence is lower than Liu Beishi <color=#ccffcc>+30%</color><color=#FFE787>Extra survival rate</color>:  For every loss of target stamina <color=#ccffcc>1%</color> then the probability <color=#ccffcc>+1 %</color>
